Render APA7 Text from Template

Source: R/apa7_templates.R
render_apa7_text.Rd

Interpolates values into APA7-compliant text templates using glue syntax.

Usage

render_apa7_text(test_type, section, values)

Arguments

test_type

Character. One of: "t_test", "welch_t", "correlation", "anova", "regression"

section

Character. One of: "methods", "results", "assumptions", "interpretation"

values

Named list of values to interpolate into template

Value

Character string with interpolated values

Examples

render_apa7_text(
  test_type = "t_test",
  section = "results",
  values = list(
    significance_text = "was significant",
    df = 98,
    t_stat = "2.05",
    p_text = "p = .042",
    ci_text = "95% CI [0.12, 3.45]"
  )
)
#> The test was significant (t(98) = 2.05, p = .042, 95% CI [0.12, 3.45]).
